titleStmt.title: A relation of a fight in the county of Lincoln, between the Kings forces, and the rebells of that county Which happened upon the eleventh day of Aprill, anno Domini, 1643. Neere Ancaster. And was presented to Her Majesty at Yorke, Aprill 13. Together with the subscription of those gentlemen whose names follow at the end of the relation.

A relation of a fight in the county of Lincoln, between the Kings forces, and the rebells of that county Which happened upon the eleventh day of Aprill, anno Domini, 1643. Neere Ancaster. And was presented to Her Majesty at Yorke, Aprill 13. Together with the subscription of those gentlemen whose names follow at the end of the relation.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at York by Stephen Bulkley,

notesStmt.note: Identified as Wing R786A, reel 2368, of the UMI microfilm set "Early English books 1641-1700".
Cf. Wing R786A which has "Lincolne" in the title.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
